name: Albedo
desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.

Solar Isotoma
has the following properties:
·When enemies within the Solar Isotoma zone take damage, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
· Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
·When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height.
· Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.Solar Isotoma is a Geo Construct.

Hold
to designate the location of the skill.
PS: Solar Isotoma only continue in 30s, and 5s later would break when the solar Isotoma lift up, multiple lifting up times is available.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Tecotonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.
basic_talent.talent2_desc: Using Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

sof.sof1_desc: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.
sof.sof2_desc:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
·Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. 
·Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
·This effect stacks up to 4 times.
sof.sof3_desc: Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.
sof.sof5_desc: Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.
